author: Kid_Paddle
title: 6 in 1!
review:
I agree with mecaone, but I want to add that also the other two cars combine to a "giant" police car. So you can build 6 cars with this set.

There are two stickers on the Fat Trax (8663) that have to be removed to create the monster truck, so you can not use them actually. Great set though and not very expensive. Must have for Tiny Turbos-lovers!
